This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Test that orientationchange event is not fired when the orientation does not change.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "NotSupportedError: screen.orientation.lock() is not available on this device."
[FAIL] Test that orientationchange event is fired when the orientation changes.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "NotSupportedError: screen.orientation.lock() is not available on this device."
Harness: the test ran to completion.
